item.title: StarkNet architecture
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: StarkNet layer 2 solution StarkNet is a layer 2 blockchain solution using ZK rollup, it provides StarkDex technology for well-known applications such as dYdX, ImmutableX, Sorare.
